content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Alexander Stubb

The following is a list of overseas trips made by Alexander Stubb during his tenure as the 13th President of Finland, which began on 1 March 2024.
2024
{| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center; background:#FFFFF0"
|-
| colspan="9" style="background:#8CA7C4;" |International trips of Alexander Stubb, President of Finland, in 2024
|-
!width=30 style=background:#BED9F6| No.
!width=40 style=background:#BED9F6| Year
!width=140 style=background:#BED9F6| Date
!width=140 style=background:#BED9F6| Country
!width=100 style=background:#BED9F6| Location
!width=200 style=background:#BED9F6| Host(s)
!width=140 style=background:#BED9F6| Reason for visit
!width=140 style=background:#BED9F6| Other
!width=80 style=background:#BED9F6| References
|-
| 1. || 2024 || 7 March ||  Norway || Alta || Jonas Gahr Støre, Prime Minister of Norway || NATO's 2024 Nordic Response exercise || ||
|-
| 2. || 2024 || 3 April ||  Ukraine || Kyiv, Hostomel || Volodymyr Zelenskyy, President of Ukraine || Working visit || [https://www.president.gov.ua/en/news/ugoda-pro-spivrobitnictvo-u-sferi-bezpeki-ta-dovgostrokovu-p-90021 Agreement on security cooperation and long-term support between Ukraine and the Republic of Finland] signed during this visit ||
|-
| 3. || 2024 || 9–10 April ||  Belgium || Brussels || Jens Stoltenberg, NATO Secretary GeneralAlexander De Croo, Prime Minister of BelgiumRoberta Metsola, President of the European Parliament,Charles Michel, President of the European Council,Josep Borrell, High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy || Working visit || [https://www.presidentti.fi/en/speech-by-president-of-the-republic-of-finland-alexander-stubb-in-brussels-on-10-april-2024/ Speech in Brussels] ||
|- style="background:#EBEBD2;"
| 4. || 2024 || 23–24 April ||  Sweden || Stockholm,Gothenburg || Carl XVI Gustaf, King of Sweden || State visit || [https://www.presidentti.fi/tasavallan-presidentti-alexander-stubbin-puhe-ruotsin-valtiovierailun-juhlaillallisella-tukholmassa-23-huhtikuuta-2024/ Speech at the Riksdag (English)][https://www.presidentti.fi/sv/republikens-president-alexander-stubbs-tal-i-sveriges-riksdag-den-23-april-2024/ Speech at the Riksdag (Swedish)][https://www.presidentti.fi/en/speech-by-president-of-the-republic-of-finland-alexander-stubb-at-the-gala-dinner-in-stockholm-on-23-april-2024/ Speech  at the gala dinner (English)][https://www.presidentti.fi/sv/republikens-president-alexander-stubbs-tal-vid-galamiddagen-i-stockholm-den-23-april-2024-i-samband-med-statsbesok-i-sverige/ Speech  at the gala dinner (Swedish)] ||
|-
| 5. || 2024 || 8 May ||  Germany || Berlin || Frank-Walter Steinmeier, President of Germany, Olaf Scholz,Chancellor of Germany || Working visit || [https://www.presidentti.fi/en/speech-by-president-of-the-republic-of-finland-alexander-stubb-at-hertie-school-in-berlin-on-8-may-2024/ Speech at Hertie School in Berlin] ||
|- style="background:#EBEBD2;"
| 6. || 2024 || 27–29 May ||  Estonia  || Tallinn || Alar Karis, President of Estonia, Kaja Kallas, Prime Minister of Estonia || State visit || [https://www.presidentti.fi/en/speech-by-president-of-the-republic-of-finland-alexander-stubb-at-the-parliament-of-estonia-the-riigikogu-on-27-may-2024/ Speech in Riigikogu]||
|-
| 7. || 2024 || May 31 ||  Sweden || Stockholm || Ulf Kristersson, Prime Minister of Sweden || Nordic summit on security and defence || [https://www.presidentti.fi/en/joint-statement-of-the-nordic-ukrainian-summit-in-stockholm/ Joint statement of the Nordic-Ukrainian Summit] ||
|-
| 8. || 2024 || 31 May–2 June ||  Spain || Madrid ||  || Bilderberg Conference || ||
|-
| 9. || 2024 || June 11 ||  Latvia || Riga || Edgars Rinkēvičs, President of Latvia || Bucharest Nine Summit || ||
|-
| 10. || 2024 || June 15–16  ||  Switzerland || Bürgenstock Resort || Viola Amherd, President of Switzerland || Ukraine peace summit || ||
|-
| 11. || 2024 || 19–20 June ||  Norway || Bodø || Jonas Gahr Støre, Prime Minister of Norway || Meeting with Norwegian Prime Minister Støre and Prime Minister of Sweden Ulf Kristersson || ||
|-
| 12. || 2024 || 3–4 July || Italy || Rome || Sergio Mattarella, President of Italy, Giorgia Meloni, Prime Minister of Italy || Working visit|| ||
|-
| 13. || 2024 || 9–11 July ||  United States || Washington D.C. || Joe Biden, President of the United States || 2024 Washington summit || ||
|-
| 14. || 2024 || 18 July ||  United Kingdom || Blenheim Palace, Woodstock, Oxfordshire || Keir Starmer, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom || 4th European Political Community Summit || ||
|-
| 15. || 2024 || 25–29 July ||  France || Paris || Emmanuel Macron, President of France || Meeting with President Macron,attending the 2024 Summer Olympics || ||
|-
| 16. || 2024 || 30–31 August ||  Czech Republic || Prague || Petr Pavel, President of the Czech Republic || GLOBSEC forum,meetings with Petr Pavel and President of Serbia Aleksandar Vučić and President of Slovenia Nataša Pirc Musar || ||
|-
| 17. || 2024 || 10 September ||  Poland || Warsaw || Andrzej Duda, President of Poland || Meeting with President Duda, keynote speaker at the Polish Ambassadorial Conference, panel discussion on the security situation in the Baltic Sea Region with Radosław Sikorski, Minister of Foreign Affairs of Poland || ||
|-
| 18. || 2024 || September 22–26 ||  United States || New York,Washington D.C. || António Guterres, UN General Secretary,Joe Biden, President of the United States || Opening of United Nations General Assembly || [https://www.presidentti.fi/en/statement-by-president-of-the-republic-of-finland-alexander-stubb-on-behalf-of-the-nordic-countries-at-the-un-security-council-open-debate-in-new-york-on-25-september-2024/ Speech at the UN][https://www.presidentti.fi/en/statement-by-president-of-the-republic-of-finland-alexander-stubb-at-the-general-debate-of-the-79th-session-of-the-un-general-assembly-in-new-york-on-25-september-2024/ Statement at the General Debate of the UN General Assembly] ||
|-
|19. || 2024 || 1 October ||  Turkey || Ankara || Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, President of Turkey || Official visit || ||
|-
|20. || 2024 || 8 October ||  Belgium || Brussels || Philippe of Belgium, King of the BelgiansMark Rutte, NATO Secretary General || Working visit || ||
|- style="background:#EBEBD2;"
|21. || 2024 || 15–17 October ||  Norway || Oslo, Bergen || Harald V, King of Norway || State visit || ||
|-
| 22. || 2024 || 21–22 October ||  Germany || Berlin || Frank-Walter Steinmeier, President of Germany,Olaf Scholz, Chancellor of Germany,Angela Merkel || The 25th anniversary of the Nordic Embassies || ||
|- style="background:#EBEBD2;"
|23. || 2024 || 29–31 October ||  China || Beijing, Shanghai || Xi Jinping, President of China || State visit || ||
|-
|24. || 2024 || 12 November ||  Azerbaijan || Baku || Ilham Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan || 2024 United Nations Climate Change Conference ||  ||
|-
|25. || 2024 || 7 December ||  France || Paris || Emmanuel Macron, President of France || Reopening of Notre-Dame de Paris ||  ||
|-
|26. || 2024 || 16–17 December ||  Estonia || Tallinn || Alar Karis, President of Estonia, Kristen Michal, Prime Minister of Estonia || Joint Expeditionary Force (JEF) Leaders' Summit || ||
|}

|-
|34. || 2025 || 29 March ||  United States || Mar-a-Lago,Florida || Donald Trump, President of United States || Unofficial visit || ||
|-
|35. || 2025 || 31 March ||  Great Britain || London || Keir Starmer, Prime Minister of United Kingdom || Working visit || ||
|-

|-
|37. || 2025 || 8–9 May ||  Norway || Oslo || Jonas Gahr Støre, Prime Minister of Norway || JEF Leaders' Summit || ||

|38. || 2025 || 12–14 May ||  Kenya || Nairobi || William Ruto, President of Kenya || State visit, to celebrate 60 years of diplomatic relations between Finland and Kenya || [https://www.presidentti.fi/en/statement-by-president-of-the-republic-of-finland-alexander-stubb-at-the-united-nations-office-in-nairobi-kenya-on-14-may-2025/ Statement by President of the Republic of Finland Alexander Stubb at the United Nations Office in Nairobi] ||
|- style=background:#EBEBD2

|-

|-
|41. || 2025 || 8–12 June ||  Japan || Hakui, Tokyo, Ōsaka || Shigeru Ishiba, Prime Minister of Japan || E.g. World Expo 2025 in Ōsaka || [https://www.presidentti.fi/joint-statement-on-reinforced-cooperation-in-the-future-between-japan-and-the-republic-of-finland/ Joint statement by Stubb and Japanese Prime Minister  Shigeru Ishiba] ||
|-

|-

|-

|-
| 46. || 2025 || 4 September ||  France || Paris || Emmanuel Macron, President of France ||
|-
| 47. || 2025 || 11 September ||  Ukraine || Kyiv || Volodymyr Zelenskyy, President of Ukraine || Working visit || ||
|- style=background:#EBEBD2
|48. || 2025 || 16–17 September ||  Latvia || Riga || Edgars Rinkēvičs, President of Latvia || State visit || ||
|-
|49. || 2025 || 22–25 September ||  United States || New York City || Annalena Baerbock, President of the UNGA || 80th session of the UNGA,Also attend a reception hosted by US President Donald Trump and his wife Melania Trump || [https://www.presidentti.fi/en/joint-statement-on-behalf-of-the-nordic-states-by-president-of-the-republic-of-finland-alexander-stubb-at-the-un-security-council-session-on-ukraine-at-the-united-nations-general-assembly-in-new-york/ Joint statement on behalf of the Nordic states by President of the Republic of Finland Alexander Stubb at the UN Security Council session on Ukraine][https://www.presidentti.fi/en/statement-by-president-of-the-republic-of-finland-alexander-stubb-at-the-general-debate-of-the-80th-session-of-the-un-general-assembly-in-new-york-on-24-september-2025/ Statement by President of the Republic of Finland, Alexander Stubb] ||
|-
|50. || 2025 || 9–10 October ||  United States || Washington D.C. || Donald Trump, President of the United States || Working visit together with Prime Minister Petteri Orpo || ||
|-
|51. || 2025 || 28–29 October ||  Kazakhstan || Astana || Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, President of Kazakhstan || Working visit|| ||
|-
